Text:
ab main kya likhon bhai jee
in 4 logon ne to kahin ka nahi choda
are yehi apne
shah g, om g, samita g, shabana g-
hosh sambhalte hi abhi MASOON hi tha ke BAAZAR, main KHAMOSHI, se PESTONJI, UMRAO JAAN le kar GIDDH ki tarha  mere pechey lag gay bas EK PAL ke liye main ne MANDI main break lagai to pata chala ke EK BAAR PHIR main TARANG main aakar ghar walon ki IJAAZAT ke baghair ANJUMAN ko SAATH SAATH leye ghoom raha hoon SITAM to ye hai ke EK DOCTOR KI MAUT PE choti si SHART laga betha hoon bas INTNI SI BAAT pe EK DIN ACHANAK us ne SAZAAYE MAUT ki khabar sunai main ne kaha ke mujhe SALAM BOMBAY to dekhne do kehne laga us PAAR jane ke leye RIHAEE pao ge to jao gey warna maa ki good main LOORIE sunte reh jao gey.ZARA SI ZINDAGI main insaan ko do BHUMIKA nibha ni chaheye phir SHAAYED us ko zindagi ki CHHOTI SI BAAT samajh aa jaye sari zindagi TAPASYA karte karte  guzar gai lekin is ki THODI SI BEWAFAI ne zindagi NAMKEEN kar di zindagi ek PAHELI ban gai hai is se MUKTI to sirf SURAJ KA SATVAN GHODA hi dilva sakta hai ye HAMARE TUMHARE bas ki baat nahi lo BAATON BAATON MAIN hum kahan se kahan aa gey intna TAMAS hai ke ANJUMAN pakar ke rakhna ho ga......to be co...
TEA BREAK.
